history.proof: intros. unfold pt_Init. split. - shelve. - intro contra. shelve. - shelve.

exceptions.tactic: intros Hcoh Hpt Hin Hneq1 Hneq2 Hfind Hinit.

exceptions.exn: In environment l : Label cn : nid pts, others : seq nid Hnin : cn \ otin pts PtsNonEmpty : pts != [::] d : dstatelet e : nat lg : Log pt : nat_eqType ds : heap i : mid from : nat_eqType to : [ordType of nid] m : TaggedMessage H : coh d H0 : pt \\in pts H1 : pt != from H2 : pt != to H3 : find i (dsoup d) = Some {| content := m; from := from; to := to; active := true |} H4 : pt_Init d e lg pt Unable to unify "st :-> (e, PInit) \\+ log :-> lg" with "loc pt {| dstate := upd to ds (dstate d); dsoup := consume_msg (dsoup d) i |}".
No such bound variable cn (possible names are: d, e, dt, lg, pt, to, ds and tms).
The LHS of contra (~~ _) does not match any subterm of the goal
Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

In environment l : Label cn : nid pts, others : seq nid Hnin : cn \ otin pts PtsNonEmpty : pts != [::] d : dstatelet e : nat lg : Log pt : nat_eqType ds : heap i : mid from : nat_eqType to : [ordType of nid] m : TaggedMessage H : coh d H0 : pt \\in pts H1 : pt != from H2 : pt != to H3 : find i (dsoup d) = Some {| content := m; from := from; to := to; active := true |} H4 : pt_Init d e lg pt i0 : mid tms : TaggedMessage b : bool H5 : find i0 (dsoup {| dstate := upd to ds (dstate d); dsoup := consume_msg (dsoup d) i |}) = Some {| content := tms; from := pt; to := cn; active := b |} Unable to unify "false" with "b".

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
l: Ordered.sort Label
cn: nid
others: seq nid
pts: seq nid
Hnin: is_true (cn \notin pts)
PtsNonEmpty: is_true (pts != [::])
d: dstatelet
e: nat
lg: Log
pt: Equality.sort nat_eqType
ds: heap
i: Ordered.sort mid
from: Equality.sort nat_eqType
to: Ordered.sort [ordType of nid]
m: TaggedMessage

Goal:
coh d -> pt \in pts -> pt != from -> pt != to -> find i (dsoup d) = Some {| content := m; from := from; to := to; active := true |} -> pt_Init d e lg pt -> pt_Init {| dstate := upd to ds (dstate d); dsoup := consume_msg (dsoup d) i |} e lg pt

Premises:
dsoup = fun d : dstatelet => let (_, dsoup) := d in dsoup : dstatelet -> soup
is_true = eq^~ true : bool -> Prop Arguments is_true _%bool_scope is_true is a coercion
Record TaggedMessage : Set := TMsg { tag : nat; tms_cont : seq nat } Arguments TMsg _%nat_scope _%seq_scope
Notation seq := list
Record dstatelet : Type := DStatelet { dstate : lstate_type heap; dsoup : soup }
Notation heap := Heap.heap
content : forall mtype : Type, msg mtype -> mtype
Inductive bool : Set := true : bool | false : bool
find : forall (K : ordType) (V : Type) (cT : union_map_class K V), K -> cT -> option V
sort : forall T : Type, rel T -> seq T -> seq T
active : forall mtype : Type, msg mtype -> bool
nat_eqType = EqType nat nat_eqMixin : eqType
dstate = fun d : dstatelet => let (dstate, _) := d in dstate : dstatelet -> lstate_type heap
mid = [ordType of nat] : ordType
nid = nat : Set
Inductive option (A : Type) : Type := Some : A -> option A | None : option A Arguments option _%type_scope Arguments Some {A}%type_scope a : rename Arguments None {A}%type_scope
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
consume_msg = fun (s : soup) (id : mid) => match find id s with | Some m => upd id (mark_msg m) s | None => s end : soup -> mid -> soup
Log = seq (bool * seq nat) : Set
Notation ordType := Ordered.type
upd : forall (K : ordType) (V : Type) (cT : union_map_class K V), K -> V -> cT -> cT
pt_Init = fun (d : dstatelet) (round : nat) (l : Log) (pt : nid) => [/\ pt_state d (round, PInit) l pt, no_msg_from_to pt cn (dsoup d) & no_msg_from_to cn pt (dsoup d)] : dstatelet -> nat -> Log -> nid -> Prop Arguments pt_Init _ _%nat_scope
Label = [ordType of nat] : ordType
pt_state_consume : forall (d : dstatelet) (ds : heap) (ps : PStateT) (lg : Log) (pt : [ordType of nid]) (i : mid) (n : [ordType of nid]), pt != n -> coh d -> pt_state d ps lg pt -> pt_state {| dstate := upd n ds (dstate d); dsoup := consume_msg (dsoup d) i |} ps lg pt
pt_PhaseTwoAbortE : forall (d : dstatelet) (e : nat) (dt : data) (lg : Log) (pt : nat_eqType) (to : nat) (ds : heap) (tms : TaggedMessage), let d' := {| dstate := upd cn ds (dstate d); dsoup := (post_msg (dsoup d) {| content := tms; from := cn; to := to; active := true |}).1 |} in coh d -> pt \in pts -> (pt == to) = false -> (forall z : nat, (z == cn) = false -> loc z d' = loc z d) -> pt_PhaseTwoAbort d e dt lg pt -> pt_PhaseTwoAbort d' e dt lg pt
pt_PhaseOneE : forall (d : dstatelet) (e : nat) (dt : data) (lg : Log) (pt : nat_eqType) (to : nat) (ds : heap) (tms : TaggedMessage), let d' := {| dstate := upd cn ds (dstate d); dsoup := (post_msg (dsoup d) {| content := tms; from := cn; to := to; active := true |}).1 |} in coh d -> pt \in pts -> (pt == to) = false -> (forall z : nat, (z == cn) = false -> loc z d' = loc z d) -> pt_PhaseOne d e dt lg pt -> pt_PhaseOne d' e dt lg pt
pt_PhaseTwoCommitE : forall (d : dstatelet) (e : nat) (dt : data) (lg : Log) (pt : nat_eqType) (to : nat) (ds : heap) (tms : TaggedMessage), let d' := {| dstate := upd cn ds (dstate d); dsoup := (post_msg (dsoup d) {| content := tms; from := cn; to := to; active := true |}).1 |} in coh d -> pt \in pts -> (pt == to) = false -> (forall z : nat, (z == cn) = false -> loc z d' = loc z d) -> pt_PhaseTwoCommit d e dt lg pt -> pt_PhaseTwoCommit d' e dt lg pt
cn_state_consume : forall (d : dstatelet) (ds : heap) (cs : CStateT) (lg : Log) (i : mid) (n : [ordType of nid]), cn != n -> coh d -> cn_state d cs lg -> cn_state {| dstate := upd n ds (dstate d); dsoup := consume_msg (dsoup d) i |} cs lg
pt_PhaseOneRespondedE : forall (d : dstatelet) (e : nat) (dt : data) (lg : Log) (b : bool) (pt : nat_eqType) (to : nat) (ds : heap) (tms : TaggedMessage), let d' := {| dstate := upd cn ds (dstate d); dsoup := (post_msg (dsoup d) {| content := tms; from := cn; to := to; active := true |}).1 |} in coh d -> pt \in pts -> (pt == to) = false -> (forall z : nat, (z == cn) = false -> loc z d' = loc z d) -> pt_PhaseOneResponded d e dt lg b pt -> pt_PhaseOneResponded d' e dt lg b pt
PhaseTwoCommit_req_round : forall (d : dstatelet) (i : mid) (m : TaggedMessage) (pt : nat_eqType) (round : nat) (lg : Log) (next_data : data), tag m = commit_req -> pt \in pts -> find i (dsoup d) = Some {| content := m; from := cn; to := pt; active := true |} -> PhaseTwoCommit d round next_data lg -> exists ps : PState, pt_state d (round, ps) lg pt
PhaseTwoAbort_req_round : forall (d : dstatelet) (i : mid) (m : TaggedMessage) (pt : nat_eqType) (round : nat) (lg : Log) (next_data : data), tag m = abort_req -> pt \in pts -> find i (dsoup d) = Some {| content := m; from := cn; to := pt; active := true |} -> PhaseTwoAbort d round next_data lg -> exists ps : PState, pt_state d (round, ps) lg pt
abort_req_pt_inv : forall (d : dstatelet) (i : mid) (m : TaggedMessage) (pt round : nat) (next_data : data) (lg : Log), find i (dsoup d) = Some {| content := m; from := cn; to := pt; active := true |} -> pt_PhaseTwoAbort d round next_data lg pt -> [/\ pt_state d (round, PRespondedYes next_data) lg pt \/ pt_state d (round, PRespondedNo next_data) lg pt, msg_spec cn pt Exports.abort_req [:: round] (dsoup d) & no_msg_from_to pt cn (dsoup d)]
prep_yes_pt_inv : forall (d : dstatelet) (i : mid) (m : TaggedMessage) (pt round : nat) (next_data : data) (lg : Log), tag m = prep_yes -> find i (dsoup d) = Some {| content := m; from := pt; to := cn; active := true |} -> pt_PhaseOne d round next_data lg pt -> [/\ pt_state d (round, PRespondedYes next_data) lg pt, no_msg_from_to cn pt (dsoup d) & msg_spec pt cn prep_yes [:: round] (dsoup d)]
prep_no_pt_inv : forall (d : dstatelet) (i : mid) (m : TaggedMessage) (pt round : nat) (next_data : data) (lg : Log), tag m = prep_no -> find i (dsoup d) = Some {| content := m; from := pt; to := cn; active := true |} -> pt_PhaseOne d round next_data lg pt -> [/\ pt_state d (round, PRespondedNo next_data) lg pt, no_msg_from_to cn pt (dsoup d) & msg_spec pt cn prep_no [:: round] (dsoup d)]
prep_req_pt_inv : forall (d : dstatelet) (i : mid) (m : TaggedMessage) (pt round : nat) (next_data : data) (lg : Log), find i (dsoup d) = Some {| content := m; from := cn; to := pt; active := true |} -> pt_PhaseOne d round next_data lg pt -> [/\ pt_state d (round, PInit) lg pt, no_msg_from_to pt cn (dsoup d) & msg_spec cn pt Exports.prep_req (round :: next_data) (dsoup d)]
commit_req_pt_inv : forall (d : dstatelet) (i : mid) (m : TaggedMessage) (pt round : nat) (next_data : data) (lg : Log), find i (dsoup d) = Some {| content := m; from := cn; to := pt; active := true |} -> pt_PhaseTwoCommit d round next_data lg pt -> [/\ pt_state d (round, PRespondedYes next_data) lg pt, msg_spec cn pt Exports.commit_req [:: round] (dsoup d) & no_msg_from_to pt cn (dsoup d)]
abort_req_cn_inv : forall (d : dstatelet) (i : mid) (m : TaggedMessage) (pt : nat_eqType), tag m = abort_req -> pt \in pts -> find i (dsoup d) = Some {| content := m; from := cn; to := pt; active := true |} -> Inv d -> exists (round : nat) (lg : Log) (next_data : data), PhaseTwoAbort d round next_data lg
commit_req_cn_inv : forall (d : dstatelet) (i : mid) (m : TaggedMessage) (pt : nat_eqType), tag m = commit_req -> pt \in pts -> find i (dsoup d) = Some {| content := m; from := cn; to := pt; active := true |} -> Inv d -> exists (round : nat) (lg : Log) (next_data : data), PhaseTwoCommit d round next_data lg
prep_req_cn_inv : forall (d : dstatelet) (i : mid) (m : TaggedMessage) (pt : nat_eqType), tag m = prep_req -> pt \in pts -> find i (dsoup d) = Some {| content := m; from := cn; to := pt; active := true |} -> Inv d -> exists (round : nat) (lg : Log) (next_data : data), PhaseOne d round next_data lg
abort_ack_pt_inv : forall (d : dstatelet) (i : mid) (m : TaggedMessage) (pt round : nat) (next_data : data) (lg : Log), tag m = abort_ack -> find i (dsoup d) = Some {| content := m; from := pt; to := cn; active := true |} -> pt_PhaseTwoAbort d round next_data lg pt -> [/\ pt_state d (round.+1, PInit) (rcons lg (false, next_data)) pt, no_msg_from_to cn pt (dsoup d) & msg_spec pt cn Exports.abort_ack [:: round] (dsoup d)]
commit_ack_pt_inv : forall (d : dstatelet) (i : mid) (m : TaggedMessage) (pt round : nat) (next_data : data) (lg : Log), tag m = commit_ack -> find i (dsoup d) = Some {| content := m; from := pt; to := cn; active := true |} -> pt_PhaseTwoCommit d round next_data lg pt -> [/\ pt_state d (round.+1, PInit) (rcons lg (true, next_data)) pt, no_msg_from_to cn pt (dsoup d) & msg_spec pt cn Exports.commit_ack [:: round] (dsoup d)]
msg_specE_consume1 : forall (s : union_map_classPCM (union_mapUMC mid (msg TaggedMessage))) (pt : nat_eqType) (from : nat) (to : nid) (to' : nat) (tg : nat_eqType) (cnt : seq_eqType nat_eqType) (i : mid) (m : TaggedMessage), valid s -> find i s = Some {| content := m; from := from; to := to'; active := true |} -> pt != from -> msg_spec pt to tg cnt s -> msg_spec pt to tg cnt (consume_msg s i)
msg_specE_consume : forall (s : union_map_classPCM (union_mapUMC mid (msg TaggedMessage))) (pt : nat_eqType) (from : nat) (to : nat_eqType) (to' : nat) (tg : nat_eqType) (cnt : seq_eqType nat_eqType) (i : mid) (m : TaggedMessage), valid s -> find i s = Some {| content := m; from := from; to := to'; active := true |} -> (pt != from) || (to != to') -> msg_spec pt to tg cnt s -> msg_spec pt to tg cnt (consume_msg s i)
msg_specE_consume2 : forall (s : union_map_classPCM (union_mapUMC mid (msg TaggedMessage))) (pt : nid) (from : nat) (to : nat_eqType) (to' : nat) (tg : nat_eqType) (cnt : seq_eqType nat_eqType) (i : mid) (m : TaggedMessage), valid s -> find i s = Some {| content := m; from := from; to := to'; active := true |} -> to != to' -> msg_spec pt to tg cnt s -> msg_spec pt to tg cnt (consume_msg s i)
step_consume_other : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (l : Label) (s s' : state) (m : mid) (tm : TaggedMessage) (from : nat) (z : nat_eqType), this != z -> network_step w z s s' -> find m (dsoup (getStatelet s l)) = Some {| content := tm; from := from; to := this; active := true |} -> find m (dsoup (getStatelet s' l)) = Some {| content := tm; from := from; to := this; active := true |}
getLocalU : forall (n : nid) (m : [ordType of nid]) (d : dstatelet) (s : soup), valid (dstate d) -> m \in dom (dstate d) -> loc n d = loc n {| dstate := upd m (loc m d) (dstate d); dsoup := s |}
step_send_other' : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (l : Label) (s s' : state) (m : mid) (tm : TaggedMessage) (to : nat) (b : bool) (z : nat_eqType), this != z -> network_step w z s s' -> find m (dsoup (getStatelet s l)) = Some {| content := tm; from := this; to := to; active := b |} -> exists b' : bool, find m (dsoup (getStatelet s' l)) = Some {| content := tm; from := this; to := to; active := b' |} /\ (b' -> b)
step_send_other : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (l : Label) (s s' : state) (m : mid) (tm : TaggedMessage) (to : nat) (b : bool) (z : nat_eqType), this != z -> network_step w z s s' -> find m (dsoup (getStatelet s' l)) = Some {| content := tm; from := this; to := to; active := b |} -> exists b' : bool, find m (dsoup (getStatelet s l)) = Some {| content := tm; from := this; to := to; active := b' |} /\ (b -> b')
msg_spec_consume : forall (s : union_map_classPCM (union_mapUMC mid (msg TaggedMessage))) (from to tg : nat) (cnt : seq_eqType nat_eqType) (cnt' : seq nat) (i : mid), valid s -> find i s = Some {| content := {| tag := tg; tms_cont := cnt' |}; from := from; to := to; active := true |} -> msg_spec from to tg cnt s -> no_msg_from_to from to (consume_msg s i)
no_msg_from_consume : forall (from : nid) (from' to : nat) (s : union_mapUMC mid (msg TaggedMessage)) (i : mid) (m : TaggedMessage), find i s = Some {| content := m; from := from'; to := to; active := true |} -> valid s -> no_msg_from from s -> no_msg_from from (consume_msg s i)
no_msg_from_to = fun (from to : nat) (d : soup) => forall (i : mid) (tms : TaggedMessage) (b : bool), find i d = Some {| content := tms; from := from; to := to; active := b |} -> b = false : nat -> nat -> soup -> Prop Arguments no_msg_from_to (_ _)%nat_scope
no_msg_from = fun (from : nid) (d : soup) => forall (i : mid) (to : nat) (tms : TaggedMessage) (b : bool), find i d = Some {| content := tms; from := from; to := to; active := b |} -> b = false : nid -> soup -> Prop
rely_consume_other : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (l : Label) (s s' : state) (m : mid) (tm : TaggedMessage) (from : nat), network_rely w this s s' -> find m (dsoup (getStatelet s l)) = Some {| content := tm; from := from; to := this; active := true |} -> find m (dsoup (getStatelet s' l)) = Some {| content := tm; from := from; to := this; active := true |}
network_step_sind : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (s1 s2 : state) (P : SProp), (s1 \In Coh w /\ s1 = s2 -> P) ->...-> P
network_step_ind : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (s1 s2 : state) (P : Prop), (s1 \In Coh w /\ s1 = s2 -> P) ->...-> P
rely_send_other : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (l : Label) (s s' : state) (m : mid) (tm : TaggedMessage) (to : nat) (b : bool), network_rely w this s s' -> find m (dsoup (getStatelet s' l)) = Some {| content := tm; from := this; to := to; active := b |} -> exists b' : bool, find m (dsoup (getStatelet s l)) = Some {| content := tm; from := this; to := to; active := b' |} /\ (b -> b')
rely_send_other' : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (l : Label) (s s' : state) (m : mid) (tm : TaggedMessage) (to : nat) (b : bool), network_rely w this s s' -> find m (dsoup (getStatelet s l)) = Some {| content := tm; from := this; to := to; active := b |} -> exists b' : bool, find m (dsoup (getStatelet s' l)) = Some {| content := tm; from := this; to := to; active := b' |} /\ (b' -> b)
ReceiveMsg : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (s1 s2 : state) (l : Label) (rt : receive_trans (Protocols.coh (getProtocol w l))), rt \In get_rt w l -> forall (i : mid) (from : nat) (pf : this \in Protocols.Exports.nodes (getProtocol w l) (getStatelet s1 l)), l \in dom s1 -> forall (C : Coh w s1) (msg0 : TaggedMessage), tag msg0 = t_rcv rt ->...-> network_step w this s1 s2
SendMsg : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (s1 s2 : state) (l : Label) (st : send_trans (Protocols.coh (getProtocol w l))), st \In get_st w l -> forall (to : nid) (msg : seq nat) (b : heap), this \in Protocols.Exports.nodes (getProtocol w l) (getStatelet s1 l) -> l \in dom s1 -> Coh w s1 -> forall S : send_safe st this to (getStatelet s1 l) msg, all_hooks_fire w l (t_snd st) s1 this msg to -> Some b = send_step S -> s2 = upd l {| dstate := upd this b (dstate (getStatelet s1 l)); dsoup := (post_msg (dsoup (getStatelet s1 l)) {| content := {| tag := t_snd st; tms_cont := msg |}; from := this; to := to; active := true |}).1 |} s1 -> network_step w this s1 s2
Inductive network_step (w : world) (this : nid) (s1 s2 : state) : Prop := Idle : s1 \In Coh w /\ s1 = s2 -> network_step w this s1 s2 | SendMsg : forall (l : Label) (st : send_trans (Protocols.coh (getProtocol w l))), st \In get_st w l -> forall (to : nid) (msg : seq nat) (b : heap), this \in Protocols.Exports.nodes (getProtocol w l) (getStatelet s1 l) -> l \in dom s1 -> Coh w s1 ->...-> network_step w this s1 s2 Arguments Idle [w] _ [s1 s2] Arguments SendMsg [w this s1 s2 l st] _ [to] [msg]%seq_scope [b] _ _ _ [S] Arguments ReceiveMsg [w this s1 s2 l rt] _ [i] [from]%nat_scope [pf] _ [C msg0]
locU : forall (n n' : nat_eqType) (x : heap) (st : union_map_classPCM (union_mapUMC nat_ordType heap)) (s : soup), n != n' -> valid st -> loc n {| dstate := upd n' x st; dsoup := s |} = loc n {| dstate := st; dsoup := s |}
Actions.tryrecv_act_step = fun (W : world) (this : nid) (filter : Label -> nid -> nat -> pred (seq nat)) (s1 s2 : state) (r : option (nid * nat * seq nat)) => exists pf : s1 \In Coh W, [/\ forall (l : Label) (m : mid) (tms : TaggedMessage) (from : nat) (rt : receive_trans (Protocols.coh (getProtocol W l))) (b : bool), this \in Protocols.Exports.nodes (getProtocol W l) (getStatelet s1 l) -> Some {| content := tms; from := from; to := this; active := b |} = find m (dsoup (getStatelet s1 l)) -> rt \In rcv_trans (getProtocol W l) -> tag tms = t_rcv rt -> msg_wf rt (coh_s l pf) this from tms -> filter l from (t_rcv rt) tms ->...-> Prop Arguments Actions.tryrecv_act_step _ _ _%function_scope
no_msg_from_toE : forall (from to : nat) (s : union_mapPCM mid (msg TaggedMessage)) (tms : TaggedMessage) (to' : nat_eqType), valid s -> no_msg_from_to from to s -> (to == to') = false -> no_msg_from_to from to (post_msg s {| content := tms; from := from; to := to'; active := true |}).1

```intros.
intros Hcoh Hpt Hin Hneq1 Hneq2 Hfind Hinit.
unfold pt_Init.
intros.
split.
- split. apply pt_PhaseOneE with (cn := cn); auto.
  + apply findPtState; auto.
  + apply not_loc_eq with (cn := cn); auto. intro contra. apply Hneq1. rewrite contra. auto.
  + apply not_loc_eq with (cn := cn); auto. intro contra. apply Hneq1. auto.
- split.
  + apply no_msg_from_to_consume_inv with (from := cn); auto.
    * apply findPtState; auto.
    * apply not_loc_eq with (cn := cn); auto. intro contra. apply Hneq1. rewrite contra. auto.
  + apply no_msg_from_to_consume_inv with (from := cn); auto.
    * apply findPtState; auto.
    * apply not_loc_eq with (cn := cn); auto.
Qed.```

original: intros. intros Hcoh Hpt Hin Hneq1 Hneq2 Hfind Hinit. unfold pt_Init. intros. split. - split. apply pt_PhaseOneE with (cn := cn); auto. + apply findPtState; auto. + apply not_loc_eq with (cn := cn); auto. intro contra. apply Hneq1. rewrite contra. auto. + apply not_loc_eq with (cn := cn); auto. intro contra. apply Hneq1. auto. - split. + apply no_msg_from_to_consume_inv with (from := cn); auto. * apply findPtState; auto. * apply not_loc_eq with (cn := cn); auto. intro contra. apply Hneq1. rewrite contra. auto. + apply no_msg_from_to_consume_inv with (from := cn); auto. * apply findPtState; auto. * apply not_loc_eq with (cn := cn); auto.
